r.s: APM and distributed tracing for PHP
r.d: The Datadog PHP Tracer brings APM and distributed tracing to PHP.
r.n:
## Tracer ### Fixed - Fix ZAI config handling for .htaccess with php-fpm #2298
## Application Security Management (0.14.2) ### Fixed - Always update enabled status on RINIT DataDog/dd-appsec-php#307 - Fix ZAI config handling for .htaccess with php-fpm #2298
